mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user VALUES (0, #{name}, #{loginId}, #{pass}, #{email}, CASE WHEN LENGTH(#{phone}) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 1, 3), '-', SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 4, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 8, 4)) WHEN LENGTH(#{phone}) = 13 THEN #{phone} END , #{gender}, #{age}, #{address}, now(), 1000, false)
mapper.select: SELECT phone FROM user where phone=CASE WHEN LENGTH(#{phone}) = 11 THEN CONCAT(SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 1, 3), '-', SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 4, 4), '-', SUBSTRING(#{phone}, 8, 4)) WHEN LENGTH(#{phone}) = 13 THEN #{phone} END
SELECT * FROM user WHERE name LIKE concat('%', #{search}, '%')
SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY rate DESC) AS ranking, userId, pass, loginId, phone, address, age, gender, name, rate, status FROM user WHERE gender="남자"
